name: Who Are You? (gamesandwutnot)
description:
NOTE: When in doubt, click the bench ;)

KNOWN BUG: If the game breaks in the browser (memory out of bounds error) please download the windows version of the game.

Undertake a journey through your thoughts, to mend your memories and rebuild severed bonds. Stuck in a hospital, trapped in your own body, you must unlock the secrets of your flickering consciousness. Forced to face difficult memories, will you be able to escape to the real world, and see beyond regrets to beautiful new beginnings? You will need to explore the strangeness of your inner world in order to unlock your story and find your way back to yourself.

Made during Global Game Jam 2020.

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/who-are-you-1

Credits:

Programming: Steven Cooney, Thomas Kiley, Tiberiu Pripu

Art: Sam Mickan

Music: Timothy Bracey

Narrative: Anna Winterstein
